meanings.sent1: The adoral teeth of the fish help it catch prey near its mouth.
meanings.sent2: The adoral position of the flower attracts pollinators.
meanings.sent3: The adoral placement of the candy dish made it easy for everyone to reach.
meanings.sent4: The adoral direction of the river flowed towards the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The adoral opening of the cave beckoned explorers to enter.

meanings.definition: Situated near or directed toward the mouth.
meanings.sent1: The adoral fins of the shark aid in its swift movements near its mouth.
meanings.sent2: The adoral location of the restaurant made it convenient for diners.
meanings.sent3: The adoral arrangement of the chairs allowed for easy conversation during meals.
meanings.sent4: The adoral path of the trail led hikers to a beautiful view near the mouth of the valley.
meanings.sent5: The adoral scent of the bakery's fresh bread drew customers inside.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the side of an organism that is closest to the mouth.
meanings.sent1: The adoral tentacles of the jellyfish help it capture food near its mouth.
meanings.sent2: The adoral markings on the butterfly's wings serve as a defense mechanism.
meanings.sent3: The adoral stripes on the zebra's face create a unique pattern.
meanings.sent4: The adoral position of the bird's nest ensured easy access to food for the chicks.
meanings.sent5: The adoral coloration of the fish camouflages it near its mouth.
